description:
When you are an apprentice spell caster, making the right choices is crucial to become a good wizard. Choose between 4 different characters and discover their stories throughout this magical game. 

Be careful, all the decisions you make will have consequences. Keep a cool mind and get all 4 protagonists to complete their lessons at the end of their story You will find up to 20 alternative endings!

Features:
- 4 different characters to choose from with their respective magical abilities.
- 20 alternative endings that will keep you in tension until the end. 
- More than 25 choices to know the end of your path.
- Collectible illustrations throughout the game's narrative.

Do you accept the challenge?
name: Magic World: Unravel the Magic
intro: A magical world where you can choose between 4 different characters, will you be a good apprentice magician or will you sow chaos in the school of magic and sorcery?
